TEXT.TITLE: DUCOMMUN <DCO> PRESIDENT RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Ducommun Inc said W. Donald Bell resigned as president and a director of the company and president of Kierulff, Ducommun's largest division. Chairman Wallace Booth will re-assume the duties of president, a role he relinquished in 1985, the company also said. Reuter
